name: 3 Minute Heroes
description:
3 Minute Heroes is a real-time strategy game that combines the genres of tower defense, deck building, and roguelike. Using the right card at the right time is the key to secure your home from waves of vicious monsters. Build your deck, place your champions, and keep your home safe for 3 minutes!

Features



Characters

10 Playable Characters : Each character has its own playstyle, with unique set of champion and cards.
Choose one to be your hero, and another as your friend. Fuse your champions into triple cards!

Cards

150+ Cards : Select cards to improve your deck at the end of each round.

Bosses

6 Rounds with 4 monster packs : Every 3 round contains 2 packs of monsters, and boss monster.
Every round takes 3 minutes. That’s right, the name of the game!

Relics

50+ Relics : Powerful relics can be found. The effects of these relics can greatly enhance your deck through powerful interactions.

Reinforcement System

Earn points and reinforce your champions : Make your champions stronger!

Updates

While in Early Access we will update:
  • New playable character : In full version, about 20 characters will be available to play.
  • New rounds with new monster packs : We plan to make full version game consist of about 10 different rounds, and 6 different monster packs.
  • Hard mode : New challenge modifiers are added for difficulty. In order to unlock next level, you need to fully clear the game for the previous level.
